cobaltResumePro 0.1.0
  • Reference

Knits resume and provides option to merge resume with cover letter into one PDF file.

Source: R/knit_resume.R
knit_resume.Rd

@param merge_resume_cover_letter If TRUE, resume and cover letter files will be merged into one PDF file.

Usage

knit_resume(..., merge_resume_cover_letter = F)

Details

Function needs to be used to overwrite knitr::knit() by using knit: cobaltResume::knit_resume in the YAML header. @examples knit: cobaltResume2.0::knit_resume(merge_resume_cover_letter = T)
